text: Next on our tour was a briefing on the status of current border infrastructure in this sector.The decision by the Biden administration to halt border wall construction has allowed cartels to take advantage of security vulnerabilities. (1/2) http

I’m at the Southern border this am in the Rio Grande Valley Sector in McAllen Texas.The first stop was a processing facility where agents stressed the policy decisions of the Biden administration are incentivizing illegal immigration and causing this crisis. http
